note:
Natural-born softie who has had his fill of shit.

Standing offer to anyone who hates confrontation- If you're being berated or bothered and want some backup, tag me in.

I shouted, directed, ordered, and cajoled professionally at work for a decade and a half. Phone call, toot, email-IDGAF. I've got your back, all I want in return is for you to feel safe and have fun here.
